PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-01902010-02-11INDUSTRY,  ,  ,  , 
ActRadiocommunication Act
SubjectRadiocommunication Act (subsection 4(1) and paragraph 9(1)(b) Exemption Order (Security, Safety and International Relations), No. 2010-1
PrecisRADIOCOMMUNICATION ACT (SUBSECTION 4(1) AND PARAGRAPH 9(1)(B)) EXEMPTION ORDER (SECURITY, SAFETY AND INTERNATIONAL RELATIONS), NO. 2010-1 - which exempts the RCMP from the application of this Act with respect to interfering with radiocommunication signals during the Winter Olympic Games in Vancouver, British Columbia fro February 12 to March 1, 2010.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0029 Publication Date: 2010-03-03
AttachmentsAttachment
